title: Cool-as-a-Cucumber Soup
directions: Process first 6 ingredients in blender or processor until smooth. Transfer mixture to bowl. Refrigerate. (Can be prepared up to 4 hours ahead.)
Ladle soup into bowls. Garnish soup with yellow bell pepper, tomato and cilantro sprigs and serve.
ingredients: 3 medium cucumbers, peeled, seeded, cut into chunks
